ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Product_Name__c) , OR( ISBLANK( Design_Number__c ) ,ISBLANK( TEXT( Jewelry_Type__c ) ),ISBLANK( TEXT( Type__c ) ),ISBLANK( TEXT( Style__c ) ), ISBLANK( TEXT( Enquiry_Value__c ) )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Product Information
